channel.title: Thankyou potions from survey?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Thankyou potions from survey?" - A question about Thankyou potions.

item.title: Re: Thankyou potions from survey?
item.content:encoded:
Oh yeah, there it is. Gonna try it now.

Huh, looks like I filled that out back at the start of october. Well, I updated it anyways.

item.title: Re: Thankyou potions from survey?
item.content:encoded:
The Surveyman one is just an ad, and has nothing to do with BvS at all.

I'm not sure if the survey is still open, but if it is, you'd find the link to it towards the bottom of your main page after logging into BvS, near the other links such as Player/Village Lookups, Change Password/E-mail, etc.

item.title: Thankyou potions from survey?
item.content:encoded:
I read in the wiki that Thankyou potions http://bvswiki.com/items:thankyou-potion can be obtained from doing "the survey"
Is this the survey you see advertised at the bottom of most pages on BVS? The "Surveyman" one?
I completed the survey but it redirected me to a nonexistant webpage and I never got any potions. Is this an error in the wiki or should I submit a BR?
